patio_Arwen: I'm hoping the petals from this flower work well as a dye. It's similar to one I used to use as a young maiden back in my home village in the woods...$h
spouseRoom_Arwen: I'm thinking of making a new line of purple blouses. What do you think? Too regal?
funLeave_Arwen: I'm going to take a nature walk today. I need to get out of the house.#$b#Maybe I'll find something to use as dye!$h
funReturn_Arwen: I had a nice, relaxing time today. How did your day go?
Rainy_Day_0: Do humans these days still keep track of the months? Or just the seasons?#$b#Keeping time seems so strange to me honey. I just want to know which hat to put on before I leave the house.#$b#Let me know if it's raining out there will you love?$h
Rainy_Day_1: You look a little soggy, dear. Why don't you warm yourself by the fire?
Rainy_Day_2: On rainy days my thoughts always drift toward cinnamon and cookies.
Rainy_Day_3: *grumble*... I just woke up and I'm hungry for some protein. Maybe you could help?$l
Rainy_Day_4: I've changed a lot over the centuries, but I still prefer sunny weather.
Rainy_Night_0: I'm ready to hop into bed whenever you are. The sound of rain will put us right to sleep.
Rainy_Night_1: How was your day, honey? I was going to do the dishes but I got absorbed in my sewing...$h
Rainy_Night_2: Oh, I'm glad you're back. It's so cold in here by myself... Are you almost ready to shut off the lights?
Rainy_Night_3: When it's raining I love sitting around a crackling fire with someone I love.$k#$b#It's great to be here with you!$l
Rainy_Night_4: Whoa... It's cold out @.#$b#I think I need someone to keep me warm.$l
Indoor_Day_0: Good morning, @! I made us some tea.[614]$h#$e#My morning just wouldn't be complete without a hot cup of tea.$h
Indoor_Day_1: Hey, honey! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#If you want to get strong, you have to eat like you mean it!
Indoor_Day_2: I'm glad I've learned to enjoy cleaning! The house gets dirty very easily.$10#$e#It's satisfying to get everything squeaky clean.#$e#Can I have a kiss before you leave?$1
Indoor_Day_3: There's always something new happening on our farm... I love it.
Indoor_Day_4: Hey, @. Heading out into the wild? I got you something...[286 287 205 732]#$e#Use that if you get into a tough spot. It should help keep you safe.
Indoor_Night_0: Welcome home, @. I hope you had a wonderful day.
Indoor_Night_1: Sometimes I pause and think of all that I've learned about humans from you...#$b#I wish all my fellow elves could know this feeling.$h
Indoor_Night_2: Hi, @. Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there!$h
Indoor_Night_3: Are you ready for bed soon? I made the bed special for us...$l
Indoor_Night_4: Good evening, honey. Did you accomplish everything you wanted to today?#$b#If not, that's okay. We've got all the time in the world!$l
Outdoor_0: Make sure to keep things tidy around your Grandpa's shrine. There's something special about it, I can feel it.
Outdoor_1: It's pretty cool that we have a cave on our property. It's something I always dreamed about.$h
Outdoor_2: I always forget to put some snacks in my pocket. *rumble*$h
Outdoor_3: Hey. When I stand here and look out over our land... I'm really proud. You've done great work!
Outdoor_4: My wildest dreams have come true... just look at this incredible landscape!
OneKid_0: It's fun to be a parent. I want to make sure %kid1 grows up to have a love for sewing like me.$h
OneKid_1: You think %kid1 will like sewing as much as I do?
OneKid_2: I think I might bake %kid1 some chocolate cake today.$h
OneKid_3: Now that we have %kid1, I kind of want a second one!$h#$b#Hint Hint!$l
OneKid_4: I was carrying %kid1 earlier, and I could've sworn I heard a "Ma...ma".$h
TwoKids_0: We've got a wonderful farm and a full family. Our new life has really turned out well, hasn't it?
TwoKids_1: My own sewing room at home, an automaton running my shop in Durin's Rest, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful spouse. Life is quite good!$h
TwoKids_2: We've come a long way, @! Look at our family!$h#$b# To be honest, I never really thought I'd end up living with a human...$k#$e#Now that I'm here with you @, I love it!$l
TwoKids_3: %kid1 and %kid2 keep messing up my threads...$a#$b#But that's okay! As much as I love sewing I love %kid1 and %kid2 more!$h
TwoKids_4: We have to make sure we give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2.$k#$b#We don't want any jealousy between them!$h
Good_0: Did I ever tell you... when you first came to Durin's Rest, the next night I had a dream that we'd be together someday.$h
Good_1: Wow, you look full of energy today!$l^You look beautiful today.$l
Good_2: @? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.$h
Good_3: @...I still can't believe we're married... It's a dream come true!$l
Good_4: Wow, you look really handsome today! Did you shave?$l^Oh, my... you look beautiful today.$l
Neutral_0: I won't ever grow old, but you will. Sometimes it makes me sad... but that's okay.$s
Neutral_1: Do you think your Grandpa would approve of an elf living in his house?
Neutral_2: You're a strange one, to want to live with an elf like me...
Neutral_3: Do you think we could get in trouble for being married? An elf and a human under the same roof?$s
Neutral_4: I think I'm going to clean the house all day! This will be fun!$h
Bad_0: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.$s
Bad_1: Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?$s
Bad_2: You've been so cold to me lately...$s
Bad_3: Maybe a relationship like this is destined to fail...$s
spring_1: Every new year I get a little sad when I remember that I've got so many more years to go, and my friends have so many less days. It's tough being nigh-immortal...$s#$b#But you make it so much more pleasant!$h
summer_1: I plan on spending a lot of time sewing you something lovely this summer.$h
fall_1: @ you look lovely this time of year!$h#$b#I really do love your adventurous style.$h#$b#You really do impress me!$l
winter_1: Sometimes winter really sucks @.#$b#But I'm sure there's better things to do in winter other than farming if you catch my drift?$l
spring_21: Oh it's my birthday? How strange...%revealtasteArwen105%revealtasteArwen272%revealtasteArwen78%revealtasteArwen119%revealtasteArwen91%revealtasteArwen148%revealtasteArwen239%revealtasteArwen412%revealtasteArwen372#$b#I guess it has been another year...#$b#I'm convinced time doesn't pass for me like it does for you.
